definitions: the part of a golf course between a tee and the corresponding green, where the grass is kept short

examples.text: keep the ball on the fairways

shortDefinitions: part of golf course between tee and corresponding green

definitions: a navigable channel in a river or harbor

examples.text: the removal of pile and swing moorings to ease the congested fairway

shortDefinitions: navigable channel in river or harbour

definitions: a regular course or track followed by ships

examples.text: bonfires will be lit along one of the old sea fairways

shortDefinitions: regular course or track followed by ships
